summary: 17 CFR § 230.904 outlines conditions for offshore resales of securities, specifying that such transactions are deemed to occur outside the U.S. if they are offshore transactions with no directed selling efforts in the U.S. and meet additional conditions. Additional conditions include ensuring that dealers or those receiving remuneration do not knowingly sell to U.S. persons and that officers or directors affiliated solely by their position do not receive remuneration beyond customary broker's commissions.
